column2:
"Okay, then, let's go. Just see that you
don't let your guard down, even in old,
familiar places, all right?"

"Death comes swiftly for those who don't pay
attention. Heh. That reminds me of this one
time, in the old days..."

"よし、では行くぞ！
通い慣れた場所だとしても
決して油断はするなよ！"

"一瞬の油断が命取りと
昔からよく言うものだ。
そう、あれは昔、私が駆け出しの……"
